member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.clsSignature.eEncryptionMode.None
member.summary: Clear text mode

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.clsSignature.eEncryptionMode.Medium
member.summary: 40-bit DES. If a longer key is set, only 40 bits used

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.clsSignature.eEncryptionMode.High
member.summary: Higher security encryption mode

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eRefreshMode.Clear
member.summary: The Display is cleared at the specified location.

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eRefreshMode.Complement
member.summary: The Display is complemented at the specified location.

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eRefreshMode.WriteOpaque
member.summary: The contents of the background memory in the tablet are transferred to the LCD display, overwriting the contents of the LCD display.

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eRefreshMode.WriteTransparent
member.summary: The contents of the background memory in the tablet are transferred to the LCD display, and combined with the contents of the LCD display.

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eSendGraphicDest.Background
member.summary: Background memory in tablet

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eCaptureMode.None
member.summary: no LCD commands are sent to the tablet

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eCaptureMode.Autoerase
member.summary: sets capture mode to be active with Autoerase in the tablet

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eCaptureMode.NoAutoerase
member.summary: sets the tablet to persistent ink capture without autoerase

member.name: F:Topaz_Sig_Sample.frmSignature.eCaptureMode.Inverted
member.summary: signature ink is displayed inverted on a suitable dark background set using the Graphic functions.
